SELECT a.id AS "orderId", CONCAT_WS( '-', a.community_name, a.build_number, a.build_unit, a.build_room, a.customer_name ) AS "customerAddressInfo", a.customer_name AS "customerName", a.customer_phone AS "customerPhone", a.item_manager AS "managerName", b.phone AS "managerPhone", ifnull( date_format( a.actual_start_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ), "æ— " ) AS "actualStartDate" FROM biz_order a LEFT JOIN biz_employee b ON a.item_manager_id = b.id WHERE a.order_inspector_id = #{pqcId}
and (a.community_name like concat('%',#{text},'%') or a.customer_name like concat('%',#{text},'%') or b.realName like concat('%',#{text},'%'))

SELECT a1.id FROM biz_order a1 INNER JOIN biz_qc_bill b1 ON a1.id = b1.order_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT q.id FROM biz_qc_check_node q WHERE q.qc_check_node_index = ( SELECT MAX(a1.qc_check_node_index) FROM biz_qc_check_node a1 WHERE a1.store_id = q.store_id AND a1.project_mode = q.project_mode
) ) e1 ON b1.qc_check_node_id = e1.id WHERE b1.qc_bill_type = 1 AND b1.is_recheck = 0 AND b1.`status` = 30 AND a1.order_inspector_id = #{pqcId}

SELECT CONCAT_WS( '-', a.community_name, a.build_number, a.build_unit, a.build_room, a.customer_name ) AS "customerAddressInfo", c.qc_check_node_name AS "qcNodeName", date_format( DATE_ADD( a.actual_start_date, INTERVAL c.days_to_check DAY ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS "planCheckDate", c.id AS "qcNodeId", c.qc_check_node_index AS "checkNodeIndex" FROM biz_order a LEFT JOIN biz_qc_check_node c ON a.store_id = c.store_id AND a.project_mode = c.project_mode WHERE a.id = #{_parameter} AND c.`status` = 1 ORDER BY c.qc_check_node_index

SELECT c.id AS "qcNodeId", b.`status` AS "qcStatus", c.qc_check_node_name AS "qcNodeName", date_format( DATE_ADD( a.actual_start_date, INTERVAL c.days_to_check DAY ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS "planCheckDate", c.qc_check_node_index AS "checkNodeIndex" FROM biz_order a LEFT JOIN biz_qc_bill b ON a.id = b.order_id AND b.qc_bill_type = 1 AND b.is_recheck = 0 INNER JOIN biz_qc_check_node c ON b.qc_check_node_id = c.id WHERE b.order_id = #{_parameter} ORDER BY c.qc_check_node_index
